title: Provider
description: A provider representation within the wunderbon domain.

examples: This provider is the wunderbon Default provider. It enables POS's around the world to deliver receipts to users identified by wunderbon account number.
This provider is the Loyalty Card 3000 provider. It enables POS's around the world to deliver receipts to users identified by the bonus program id (the user does not require to identify again).

This provider is the Membership Bonus Program provider. It enables POS's around the world to deliver receipts to users identified by the bonus program id (the user does not require to identify again).
